#summary How to contribute to the development of JAKOB
#labels Featured

= Get involved =
Every one is encouraged to contribute to the further development of JAKOB and the continuing effort to keep the documentation up to date.

== Report an issue ==
The easiest way to contribute is to install and try JAKOB, and reporting any issues back to this [http://code.google.com/p/jakob/issues/list page].

== Contribute code ==
Bug fixes, new features and new/improved documentation is much appreciated. Just create an issue [http://code.google.com/p/jakob/issues/list here] with your contribution and the team members will have a look as soon as possible.
